TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceSource extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that enable applications to trace the execution of code and associate trace messages with their source.

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that enable applications to trace the execution of code and associate trace messages with their source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由应用程序用来生成可与应用程序相关联的跟踪。The class is used by applications to produce traces that can be associated with the application. 提供了一些跟踪方法，利用这些跟踪方法，你可以方便地跟踪事件，跟踪数据和发出信息跟踪。 provides tracing methods that allow you to easily trace events, trace data, and issue informational traces. 跟踪输出可通过配置文件设置控制。Trace output from can be controlled by configuration file settings. 配置文件位于与应用程序可执行文件夹中，并具有扩展名.config 文件添加应用程序的名称。The configuration file is located in the folder with the application executable and has the name of the application with the .config file name extension added. 例如，TraceSourceSample.exe 的配置文件的名称是 TraceSourceSample.exe.config。配置文件可以用于确定发送的跟踪信息的位置和要跟踪的活动级别。For example, the name of the configuration file for TraceSourceSample.exe is TraceSourceSample.exe.config. The configuration file can be used to determine where the trace information is to be sent and what levels of activity are to be traced. 下面的示例演示的示例应用程序配置文件的内容。The following example shows the contents of a sample application configuration file. ```xml ``` 类由源，通常为应用程序的名称的名称。The class is identified by the name of a source, typically the name of the application. 来自特定组件的跟踪消息可由启动特定的跟踪源，允许所有消息来自该组件就可以轻松识别。The trace messages coming from a particular component can be initiated by a particular trace source, allowing all messages coming from that component to be easily identified. 定义跟踪方法，但实际上并不提供任何特定的机制用于生成和存储跟踪数据。 defines tracing methods but does not actually provide any specific mechanism for generating and storing tracing data. 跟踪侦听器，是可以由跟踪源加载的插件被生成跟踪数据。The tracing data is produced by trace listeners, which are plug-ins that can be loaded by trace sources. > [!NOTE] > 不应在终止期间调用跟踪方法。You should not call the tracing methods during finalization. 这样可以导致引发。Doing so can result in an being thrown. 可以通过添加或删除自定义跟踪输出的目标实例到或从存储在集合属性。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding or removing instances to or from the collection stored in the property. 默认情况下，使用的实例生成跟踪输出类。By default, trace output is produced using an instance of the class. 上面的配置文件示例演示了如何移除和添加以生成跟踪源的跟踪输出。The preceding configuration file example demonstrates removing the and adding a to produce the trace output for the trace source. 有关详细信息，请参阅[<侦听器>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md)和[ <sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md)。For more information, see [<listeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md) and [<sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md). > [!NOTE] > 添加到跟踪侦听器集合可能导致异常引发时进行跟踪，如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常取决于跟踪侦听器，并不能在本主题中枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 它可能会有用呼叫中的方法`try` / `catch`块来检测和处理从跟踪侦听器的任何异常。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 类提供了一种能够动态地控制跟踪输出。The class provides the means to dynamically control the tracing output. 前面的配置文件示例演示如何你可以关闭从跟踪源和控制哪些跟踪的级别发生的跟踪。The preceding configuration file example shows how you can turn off tracing from a trace source and control the level at which tracing occurs. 无需重新编译你的应用程序，可以修改源开关的值。You can modify the value of the source switch without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅和[如何： 创建、 初始化和配置跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see and [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果在执行应用程序时修改配置文件，必须停止并重新启动应用程序或必须调用方法，然后新设置才会生效。If you modify a configuration file while an application is executing, the application must be stopped and restarted or the method must be called before the new settings take effect. 枚举用于定义跟踪消息的事件类型。The enumeration is used to define the event type of the trace message. 跟踪筛选器使用确定如果跟踪侦听器应生成跟踪消息。Trace filters use the to determine if a trace listener should produce the trace message. 跟踪侦听器可根据需要通过跟踪筛选器筛选的附加层。The trace listeners can optionally have an additional layer of filtering through a trace filter. 如果跟踪侦听器具有关联的筛选器，该侦听器将调用上该筛选器，以确定是否生成跟踪信息的方法。If a trace listener has an associated filter, the listener calls the method on that filter to determine whether or not to produce the trace information. 跟踪侦听器使用的值类属性， ，和跟踪输出的格式。The trace listeners use the values of the class properties , , and to format trace output. 你可以使用配置文件属性来设置， ，和属性。You can use configuration file attributes to set the , , and properties. 下面的示例设置属性`false`和为 3 的属性。The following example sets the property to `false` and the property to 3. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用类将转发到侦听器的跟踪。The following code example shows the use of the class to forward traces to listeners. 该示例还演示了交换机和筛选器的使用情况。The example also demonstrates switch and filter usage. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CPP/tracesource2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 源名称用于标识跟踪。The source name is used to identify traces. 它由确定跟踪侦听器是否应生成跟踪。It is used by a to determine whether a trace listener should produce the trace. 建议的做法是使用应用程序的名称作为源名称。The recommended practice is to use the name of the application for the source name. > [!NOTE] > 不需要创建一个新为每个跟踪请求的实例。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 创建一个实例并使用它的应用程序的所有跟踪请求。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用构造函数来创建一个新对象。The following code example shows the use of the constructor to create a new object. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 源名称用于标识跟踪。The source name is used to identify traces. 它可由以确定是否发生跟踪和来确定是否可生成跟踪。It can be used by a to determine if tracing is to occur and by a to determine whether to produce the trace. 使用默认源级别以确定是否发生跟踪基于要跟踪的消息的源级别。The default source level is used by an to determine if tracing is to occur based on the source level of the message to be traced. > [!NOTE] > 不需要创建一个新为每个跟踪请求的实例。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 创建一个实例并使用它的应用程序的所有跟踪请求。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识应用程序的配置文件中引用的自定义属性。The property identifies the custom attributes referenced in the application's configuration file. 未引用的自定义属性不会枚举。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 继承自的类类可以通过重写中添加自定义特性方法并返回的自定义属性名称的字符串数组。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. 以下是指定自定义特性的跟踪源元素的一个示例`SecondTraceSourceAttribute`:The following is a sample of a trace source element specifying the custom attribute `SecondTraceSourceAttribute`: ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的自定义属性。The following code sample shows how to display the custom attributes for a . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许跟踪源调用中的侦听器之前的消息筛选。The property allows the filtering of messages before the trace source calls the listeners. 使用开关来检查是否应生成或忽略跟踪调用。The switch is used to check whether trace calls should be generated or ignored. 每个跟踪方法调用方法来确定是否继续进行跟踪。Each trace method calls the method of the to determine whether to proceed with the trace. 如果调用返回`true`，则将调用侦听器。If the call returns `true`, the listeners are called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法、 like方法，适用于自动工具，但它还允许其他对象，如异常实例，对此跟踪在附加。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of an additional object, such as an exception instance, to the trace. 方法调用方法返回对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果返回`true`，调用相应上的所有侦听器方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否则为返回而不会调用的侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，对象使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法筛选，并将跟踪消息转发到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to filter and forward a trace message to the listeners. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法、 like方法，适用于自动工具，但它还允许附加其他对象，如异常实例和堆栈跟踪，对此跟踪。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of additional objects, such as an exception instance and a stack trace, to the trace. 方法调用方法返回对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果返回`true`，调用相应上的所有侦听器方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否则为返回而不会调用的侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，对象使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的意图是可由工具自动处理的跟踪事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，监视工具可以通知管理员特定事件跟踪由特定的源。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用方法返回对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果返回`true`，调用相应的每个侦听器的方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则为返回而不会调用的侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是特定于侦听器。The trace content is listener specific. 如果侦听器实现不重写该方法，默认输出将为跟踪源、 其数字标识和事件类型的名称。If the method is not overridden by the listener implementation, the default output is the name of the trace source, its numeric identity, and the event type. 其他跟踪内容是依赖于该侦听器的属性值。Additional trace content is dependent upon the listener's property value. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法以将跟踪事件传递到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`format`参数，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the `format` parameter, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). 方法的意图是可由工具自动处理的跟踪事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，监视工具可以通知管理员特定事件跟踪由特定的源。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用方法返回对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果返回`true`，调用相应的每个侦听器的方法。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则为返回而不会调用的侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是特定于侦听器。The trace content is listener specific. 默认值方法将写入源名称、 事件类型和数字标识中的跟踪标头，然后调用方法，并传递`format`字符串和`args`数组并使用属性格式化作为消息输出的字符串。The default method writes the source name, event type, and numeric identity in the trace header, then calls the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array and using the property to format the string as the message output. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，对象使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了利用方法以将跟踪事件传递到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供旨在由用户而不是工具读取一条信息性消息。The method provides an informational message intended to be read by users and not by tools. 调用方法，设置`eventType`到并将作为消息字符串中传递的信息性消息。 calls the method, setting `eventType` to and passing the informative message as the message string. 方法反过来调用方法的每个跟踪侦听器。The method in turn calls the method of each trace listener.

span.span: Writes a trace transfer message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified numeric identifier, message, and related activity identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法中的每个跟踪侦听器属性来写入跟踪信息。The method calls the method of each trace listener in the property to write the trace information. 默认值基类中的方法类调用方法以处理调用，设置`eventType`到和追加的字符串表示形式`relatedActivityId`GUID `message`。The default method in the base class calls the method to process the call, setting `eventType` to and appending a string representation of the `relatedActivityId` GUID to `message`. 旨在与的逻辑操作一起使用。 is intended to be used with the logical operations of a . `relatedActivityId`参数与属性对象。The `relatedActivityId` parameter relates to the property of a object. 如果逻辑运算开始一个活动中，然后转移到另一个，第二个活动来记录通过调用该传输方法。If a logical operation begins in one activity and transfers to another, the second activity logs the transfer by calling the method. 呼叫与新的活动标识相关到以前的身份。The call relates the new activity identity to the previous identity. 此功能的最有可能使用者是可以报告跨越多个活动的逻辑操作的跟踪查看器。The most likely consumer of this functionality is a trace viewer that can report logical operations that span multiple activities.
